Miami_Gardens.WPXM-TV: WPXM-TV, virtual and UHF digital channel 35, is an Ion Television owned-and-operated television station licensed to Miami, Florida, United States and also serving Fort Lauderdale. Owned by Ion Media Networks, WPXM maintains offices and master control facilities located on Northwest 14th Street in Sunrise, and its transmitter is located on Southwest 27th Street in West Park. It also shares a sales office with Lake Worth-licensed sister station WPXP-TV (serving the West Palm Beach market) on Northeast 20th Avenue in North Miami.
